entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning early this evening then changing to periods of light snow or rain late this evening. entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
